name: Reilley Gray
description: Software Developer with over four years of experience in fullstack development. Expertise in Java and JavaScript, and a proficiency in React.js for front-end development. Committed to delivering innovative solutions and continuously expanding my skill set. Ready to contribute to your team's success through collaborative efforts.

skills.heading: Infrastructure
items: Amazon Web Services (EC2, ECS, RDS, Lambda, Cognito, S3, Amplify and SQS)

description:
Initially joined as a contract worker, focused on establishing a test framework for a Java EJB
monolithic REST API supporting a financial tech SaaS product.

Transitioned to a full-time software developer role in December 2019, specializing in frontend
development within a React.js project for the same SaaS product.

Led successful migration of the React.js project from class-based to hook-based architecture,
improving code maintainability and performance.

Demonstrated commitment to staying current with emerging technologies, consistently
updating and maintaining the project's technology stack.

Contributed to building Java Spring Boot microservices, enhancing system modularity and
scalability.

Exhibited strong client-facing skills, actively engaging with clients and delivering tailored
solutions.

Spearheaded a project towards the end of my employment, showcasing leadership and autonomy
in delivering cutting-edge solutions using React.js and Spring Boot technologies to build a
client-specific extension for our main SaaS product.

Opted for a purposeful leave of absence from university, I directed my focus towards career
opportunities at CapitalRoad

While honing my expertise in programming languages like Java, Ruby, Python, and JavaScript, I
concurrently acquired valuable insights into agile project management methodologies.

My proficiency in Ruby and Vue.js, particularly, was cultivated through my capstone project, a
financial tech SaaS product, showcasing practical application and hands-on experience.

Additionally, I pursued a minor in business, broadening my knowledge and skills to complement
my technical background.

education.description: I completed my Certificate III in Business at Lakeview Senior College, where I delved into fundamental business practices. Through this program, I gained proficiency in essential skills such as spreadsheet production, the application of workplace health and safety (WHS) legislation, and effective organization of personal work priorities and development. These valuable insights not only expanded my knowledge in business operations but also equipped me with practical skills that have proven to be invaluable in my career pursuits
